name: Turn the light off
description:
You are a robot who caught a virus, your goal is to turn off the switches that keep the virus alive, but beware, turning off the switches also turn off something else!!!

Controls:

Use W, A , S, D or the arrows keys to navigate

Use Space to activate the switches

Game made for the Trijam #60: When The Lights Turn Off.

Optional Challenges completed:
  • Design a game with 10 levels.
  • Share the source code of your project: https://codeshare.io/G8KoMe
The game development took 3 hours: 
  • 45 minutes for arts.
  •  1 hour 30 minutes for coding.
  •  45 minutes for level design.
